meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6243.

td.p: Erin McLean, a junior at Boston University from Danvers, Massachusetts
Tom Nissley, a writer from Seattle, Washington
Justin Sausville, a urologist from Baltimore, Maryland

tr.td: TWINS
BOND MOVIE BY BOND GIRL
& JUSTICE FOR ALL
THE HILLS ARE ALIVE
POLITICAL LEADERS
COMPLETES THE PROVERB

$10,399
TomWho is Corday?
$1,001
Charlotte Corday')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'She said, "I told my plans to no one. I was not killing a man, but a wild beast that was devouring the French people"')

tr.td: FRENCH HISTORY
She said, "I told my plans to no one. I was not killing a man, but a wild beast that was devouring the French people"
Justin
Tom
Erin
2nd place: $10,000
Finalist
3rd place: $10,000
Justin
Tom
Erin

27 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
